entry.title: Sunday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending late this morning then mainly cloudy. Occasional drifting snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 22 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 07:10 AM MST Sunday 22 January 2023
